change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.unittitle: Report of an Exploration, Written at Mission Dolores, Pimeria Alta 1699
did.abstract: Holograph report of an expedition made by Kino and Fr. Antonio Leal into southwestern Arizona in 1699. Includes extensive description of the geography, resources, native peoples, and missionary organization in the area.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

did.langmaterial: Materials are in Spanish, with English translation in facsimile.

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: Restricted; patrons use facsimile due to fragile condition.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: It is the responsibility of the user to obtain permission to publish from the owner of the copyright (the institution, the creator of the record, the author or his/her transferees, heirs, legates, or literary executors). The user agrees to indemnify and hold harmless the Arizona Board of Regents for the University of Arizona, its officers, employees, and agents from and against all claims made by any person asserting that he or she is an owner of copyright.

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Report of an Exploration, Written at Mission Dolores, Pimeria Alta (AZ 438). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Jesuit missionary assigned in 1687 to the Pimeria Alta, Viceroyalty of Mexico.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Holograph report of an expedition made by Kino and Fr. Antonio Leal into southwestern Arizona in 1699. Includes extensive description of the geography, resources, native peoples, and missionary organization in the area.

relatedmaterial.p: Related materials may be found at: AZ 439.
